objective_28893_LogFailed: I missed my chance to take part in the quarry raid. Next time I should be more careful about the time.
objective_32646_LogCompleted: We rode past the stud farm and were soon in the woods between Neuhof and Uzhitz. We passed by the charcoal kilns next to the stream and shortly after found ourselves in the small encampment concealed nearby the main road.
objective_38676_LogFailed: Incredible! Fritz and Matthew actually pulled off the quarry robbery, despite the coin being guarded by a whole squad of Talmberg's finest!
